title: Dogecoin, Citigroup, Novavax, Las Vegas Sands: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Tesla made some of its merchandise available for purchase with dogecoin; Major bank earnings are rolling in
body:
Stock futures are slipping amid the first wave of major bank earnings of the season. Here’s what we’re watching in Friday’s trading:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
